apps.title: STNDRD: Bodybuilding Workouts
apps.description: Unleash Your Strength with STNDRD — Your Ultimate Bodybuilding & Fitness Community Elevate your fitness journey with STNDRD, the premier app designed to help you unlock your full potential. Whether you're aiming to build muscle, tone your body, or enhance overall fitness, STNDRD provides the tools, guidance, and motivation you need to achieve greatness. Led by the Best in the Industry Train under the expert guidance of 6x Mr. Olympia Champion, Chris Bumstead (CBUM). His exclusive bodybuilding-focused workout program offers a comprehensive approach to fitness, with detailed exercise information, weight tracking, and nutrition features to ensure you stay on track. Tailored Programs for Every Level No matter where you are in your fitness journey, STNDRD has something for you. Our extensive library of programs includes: • Strength & Conditioning • Bodybuilding • HIIT (High-Intensity Interval Training) • Powerlifting • Functional Fitness • Cardio • Circuit Training • Bodyweight Exercises • Athletic Performance • Mobility & Flexibility Training • Recovery Sessions • Home and Gym Workouts • … and more! Exclusive Membership Benefits Join STNDRD's paid membership to access exclusive content that will take your training to the next level. Stay motivated with: • Weight tracking to monitor your progress • Detailed exercise information to perfect your form • Nutrition features to complement your workouts • A supportive community to share your journey and celebrate your success • Flexibility & Power at Your Fingertips Whether you prefer a structured program or spontaneous workouts, STNDRD adapts to your lifestyle. Train with or without equipment, and find the flexibility you need to fit workouts into your busy schedule. Subscription Pricing & Terms STNDRD is free to download and offers flexible subscription plans: Monthly or Annually. Enjoy an exclusive free trial when you sign up. Subscriptions renew automatically, and you can manage or disable auto-renewal in your Profile Settings. Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/ Join the STNDRD Community Take your bodybuilding and fitness journey to new heights with STNDRD. Download NOW!

raw_data.title: STNDRD: Bodybuilding Workouts
raw_data.release_note: Experience a significant upgrade in your fitness journey with The STNDRD App. New Features and Enhancements 1. Introducing a brand new Jacklete Program inside the app to elevate your fitness journey with structured workouts designed for optimal results. 2. Upgraded habit tracking experience to help users stay accountable and measure progress more effectively throughout their Jacklete challenge. General Fixes and Improvements 3. Flashlight icon state now correctly updates when switching between rear and front cameras. 4. Resolved issue where a loader appeared even when the user had no followings in the Following Posts section. 5. Addressed specific behavior causing UI flickering and unresponsive buttons after permission denial. 6. Fixed a bug where the app turned into a black screen and became unresponsive after saving notes in the Nutrition module. 7. Logged food entries now persist correctly when navigating between dates on the Nutrition page. 8. Serving digits no longer overlap with the serving size text. 9. Users without access to the Recipe feature no longer see the “Items Added” tile. 10. Nutrition percentage values on the full nutrition info page now reflect the correct data without resetting to zero. 11. “Add Food” popup now correctly appears after updating values from a barcode scan. 12. Fixed an issue where only audio played while the video remained invisible, showing only an image placeholder. 13. Resolved overlapping sound effects when tapping the “Join Program” button. 14. New Set Intensifier name now displays correctly during workout execution. 15. All new intensifiers have been added to the Custom Workout feature. 16. Fixed an issue where completed programs were incorrectly labeled as “Rest Day” in the Dashboard. 17. Habit Tracker count is now capped correctly, preventing old badges from reappearing after exceeding limits. For any issues or feedback, please contact us at support@stndrd.app

apps.title: Aaptiv: #1 Audio Fitness App
apps.description: Everyone deserves the benefits of moving smarter. That’s why we created Aaptiv, an AI-powered audio and video fitness app that creates hyper-personalized workout plans and on-demand classes led by expert trainers to help you crush your fitness goals. Whether you’re a fitness guru or just getting started, Aaptiv can create the perfect workout tailored just to you. FEATURES: SmartCoach: With Aaptiv, you become the star of your own fitness journey. Our SmartCoach feature, powered by AI, acts as your trusty pocket personal trainer. It starts by asking you a series of questions to understand your age, physical ability, and goals. Armed with this information, SmartCoach creates a tailor-made workout plan that's just right for you. It's like having a dedicated personal trainer that's always by your side, pushing you to greatness! Audio & Video Workouts: With over 10,000 on-demand audio and video workouts at your fingertips, boredom is simply not an option. Aaptiv covers it all, from running and walking to elliptical sessions, strength training, stretching, yoga, and even rowing. We're constantly adding new classes to keep things fresh and exciting because we believe that variety is the spice of fitness! Stats: We know that progress is key to staying motivated, so we've included the awesome Stats feature in the app. Keep track of your accomplishments, monitor your improvements, and celebrate your victories over time. It's your personal dashboard of success! Heart Rate Zone Training: Take your workouts to the next level by pairing Aaptiv with a smart device to measure your heart rate. Our heart rate-based workouts provide on screen feedback, helping you stay in the optimal heart rate zone for maximum effectiveness. Programs & Challenges: These multi-week programs are tailored to specific fitness goals, whether you're aiming to conquer a 5K, build some serious muscle, or shed those extra pounds. Stay committed by completing the workouts in the program and watch your transformation unfold! Music: Need some epic tunes to keep you motivated? Aaptiv has you covered! Choose to listen to your own music while our trainers' voices guide you through the workout, or tap into our specially curated playlists that are guaranteed to get your blood pumping and energy soaring. Community Feed: Fitness isn't just a solo journey—it's a community-driven adventure! Capture your sweaty selfies and share your progress with other like-minded individuals in our vibrant Community Feed. Get inspired, motivate others, and revel in the support of your fellow fitness enthusiasts. Get unlimited access to all classes for USD$14.99/month or USD$99.99/year. We also offer a 100% money back guarantee for the annual plan within 30 days, no questions asked. – Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase – Subscription automatically renews unless auto–renew is turned off at least 24–hours before the end of the current period – Account will be charged for renewal within 24–hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal – Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto–renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase – Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable Terms of use: https://aaptiv.com/terms

apps.title: Yuka - Food & Cosmetic Scanner
apps.description: ◆ 70 MILLION USERS ◆ Yuka is a free mobile app that allows you to scan the barcodes of food and personal care products and instantly see their impact on your health. A rating and detailed information help you understand the analysis of each product. When a product has a negative impact on your health, Yuka also recommends similar but healthier alternative products. ◆ A 100% INDEPENDENT PROJECT ◆ Yuka is a 100% independent project : product reviews and recommendations of healthier alternatives are done in an objective way. No brand or manufacturer can influence them in one way or another. Furthermore, there is no in-app advertising. You can access detailed information on our business model on our website (www.yuka.io). ◆ 5 MILLION REFERENCED PRODUCTS ◆ Yuka established a database that contains 3 million food products and 2 million cosmetic products. Each food product is evaluated according to 3 objective criteria: nutritional quality, presence of additives and organic aspect of the product. The method to analyse cosmetic products is based on the analysis of all the ingredients of the product. Each ingredient is assigned a risk level according to the latest scientific data. --- Terms of use: https://yuka-app.helpdocs.io/l/en/article/2a12869y56

apps.title: Mindbody: Fitness & Wellness
apps.description: Mindbody is the world’s #1 booking platform for fitness, beauty, and wellness experiences. We encourage people to try new things and find what makes them feel physically, mentally, and spiritually their best. Whether it’s a class, salon service, or meditation session, we’ve got options. With over 40k+ studios around the world, we offer top fitness classes like yoga, Pilates, barre, dance, HIIT, bootcamp, and more. Looking for something along the lines of a massage, hair treatment, or cryotherapy? We’ve got that too. Plus, you’ll find promoted intro offers and last-minute deals—it’s all on the app. How it works: * Download the free app, then create a Mindbody account (or log in to your existing account) to get started. * Enter your location at the top of the screen to see local intro offers, price drops, and deals near you. * Looking for something in particular? Jump to the “SEARCH” icon at the bottom of the window to find businesses near you. From there, you can type in the desired service or browse popular categories. * Need to refine your results? Filter your search by business, class, date, time, distance, or category. You can also sort based on what’s recommended, top-rated or closest to you. * Once you select a class or appointment, you can read up on reviews, instructor & service provider bios, and how to get there. You can also choose a business first to learn more about their amenities, schedule, services, location, and pricing. * When you’re ready to secure your service, select the “Book” button in the right-hand corner. From there, you will be asked to confirm your payment information. Plug in your info, then hit “BOOK AND BUY” to make it official. Why you’ll love it: * Variety: You’ve got local fitness, beauty, salon, spa, and wellness options in the palm of your hand—you decide what works for you. * Value: You'll get the best deals to try a new studio or drop-in on a fitness class without committing to a membership. * Verified reviews: Know what people are saying about services before you book, with reviews from verified users. *Flexible Pricing available in the US only *Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life

apps.description: Transform Your Fitness Journey with Fitness Buddy – The Ultimate Workout Companion! Featured In: • Chicago Tribune: "It’s like having a personal trainer at home without the cost!" • ESPN Magazine • Gizmodo: "One of the best iPhone apps ever." Achieve Your Health & Fitness Goals with Personalized Workouts, Meal Plans, and Progress Tracking! Fitness Buddy is your all-in-one fitness app for home and gym workouts, weight loss, and nutrition. Access customizable workout plans, hundreds of exercises, and meal plans that fit your goals, whether you're building muscle, losing weight, or staying active. Tailored Workout Plans Just for You Choose from over 20+ workout programs, including strength training, cardio, HIIT, and flexibility routines. With 2400+ workouts covering full-body, core, arms, legs, and more, you’ll find a plan for every fitness level. Perfect for gym enthusiasts and at-home workouts! Easy-to-Follow Workout Guides Get step-by-step workout instructions, HD videos, and helpful tips to improve your exercise form and stay motivated. Whether you’re new to fitness or a seasoned gym-goer, our guides make it easy to start and progress. Unlimited Exercise Options Explore over 2400+ exercises with variations in strength, cardio, HIIT, and flexibility training. Easily filter by equipment, body part, or difficulty to build your custom workout routine. From bodyweight exercises to dumbbells and machines, Fitness Buddy covers it all! Stay on Track with Health & Weight Loss Goals Track your progress, calories burned, and weight changes with our easy-to-use fitness tracker. Set goals, monitor your health, and stay motivated. Whether you're aiming for weight loss, muscle gain, or general fitness, Fitness Buddy keeps you on track every step of the way. Customized Nutrition & Meal Plans for Healthy Eating Access personalized meal plans to support your fitness journey! Choose from keto, paleo, fasting, and vegetarian diets with calorie and nutrient tracking for each recipe. Easily log and monitor your meals for a balanced, healthy diet that fuels your workouts. Stay Motivated & Accountable Connect Fitness Buddy with Apple Health to sync your progress, schedule reminders, and monitor your health metrics. Build lasting fitness habits and stay motivated with personalized insights and fitness calendars to track every workout. Why Choose Fitness Buddy? Comprehensive Workout Library – 2400+ exercises for home and gym workouts. Goal-Focused Plans – Tailored workouts for weight loss, strength, and more. Easy Nutrition Tracking – Personalized meal plans for every health goal. Progress Tracking & Motivation – Visual insights to track your health improvements. Transform your health and fitness journey with Fitness Buddy – the only app you need to achieve your weight loss, muscle gain, or fitness goals. *Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. We offer auto-renewing subscriptions with the following specifications: • Subscriptions are 1 month or 12 months long. • Payment will be charged to your Apple Account at confirmation of purchase. • Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. • Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period and identify the cost of the renewal. • Subscriptions may be managed by the user, and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase. • No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. • Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication. • Read our full Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy at: https://kodeon.ai/privacy-policy and https://kodeon.ai/terms-of-use • EULA: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/ Download Fitness Buddy today!

apps.title: AF App
apps.description: Experience personalized coaching designed with your goals in mind at your fingertips. The AF App offers so much more than just workouts: • Monitor your progress as you work towards your goals • Connect with Anytime Fitness Coaches virtually and get the support you need when you need it • Connect with the Anytime Fitness community and get the answers to your questions from expert coaches and members • Find practical advice and tips on everything from fitness, recovery and nutrition—and everything in between. It all starts with a plan. Answer a few questions about your goals and what’s important to you and we’ll take it from there. You’ll receive a plan including workouts, tips for making progress in your journey and weekly challenges that will move you towards your goal. Access workouts around the clock—anytime, anywhere. Our digital workouts can be done anywhere you are, helping your goals stay within reach and keep you on track wherever life takes you. You can modify your workouts by duration, location, and intensity plus you’re able to connect with a coach via video chat or messaging making your fitness journey a group effort between you and our team. Stay connected on your health journey. With the AF App you can also connect with other Anytime Fitness members and join in on the conversations that matter most to you! Interested in learning about sleep health? Want more info on active recovery? Or maybe you are looking for advice on how to get over a performance plateau—it’s all happening on the AF App. Get answers from expert coaches and members alike and prepare to be inspired by the magic that our community brings. Share your fitness stats your coaches. Connect the AF App with the Apple Health App to share your fitness stats with your coach. Now you can automatically keep your coach up-to-date on your daily activity levels, sleep, resting heart rate and more.

apps.title: Fitplan®: Gym & Home Workouts
apps.description: Work out at home or in the gym with the largest roster of elite trainers ever assembled. Choose from Olympic athletes, bodybuilding pros, or dozens of the leading names in fitness who are here to motivate you, make you sweat, and help you achieve the body of your dreams. Whether you are a beginner or a pro, starting a Fitplan® program is the first step toward being stronger, healthier, and happier than ever before! Working out has never been easier. “I’ve been a Fitplan® subscriber for over a year. I’ve tried many different plans and trainers. This app is amazing. From the technology down to its friendly design, the app can take your gym game further than you ever imagined. Never has it been easier to be trained by elite fitness instructors at a low price.” “I am 42, have had a gym membership since my 20’s, and Fitplan® programs has finally inspired me to work out consistently. I imagine it’s mostly due to having a routine and knowing that the correct exercises are being utilized. Wish I had this app 10 years ago!” Get instant step-by-step personal training and bodyweight workouts from the world’s top fitness experts. Lose weight, build muscle and sculpt your physique with Michelle Lewin, Jen Selter, Jeff Seid, Rob Gronkowski, and many more, with new trainers and plans frequently added. Types of plans that you will find on Fitplan® programs include: Home workouts Bodybuilding Bodyweight HIIT Training Booty Training Weightlifting Athletic Training Hypertrophy Functional Training Bulking Shredding and Weight Loss Choose from dozens of personal training programs, designed by your favorite fitness experts. Work out at the gym, at home, or anywhere life takes you. Don’t know where to begin or which Fitplan® program to choose? Answer a few questions and we’ll recommend the best plans for you. Follow our daily workouts with step-by-step HD video instruction. See how your entire body transforms with your hard work and sweat! Keep tabs on your weights, reps and time, and watch your results take shape. Get involved with our community, make friends, and get motivated! Try Fitplan® app free for 7 days. Every subscription includes full access to our growing library of 100+ Fitplan® programs. Access all Fitplan® programs with a subscription membership. Try our collection of single-day workouts for free. Fitplan® app Links: Instagram: @fitplan_app Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/groups/fitplancommunity/ Support: support@fitplanapp.com Note: Cancel any time by visiting settings in the app. If you cancel 24 hours before the 7-day trial is over then you will not be charged. If you cancel during the month period for which you've already paid (up to 24 hours before the next period starts), your subscription will continue until the end of that period. Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable View Fitplan's privacy policy at https://www.fitplanapp.com/privacy-policy and terms of use at https://www.fitplanapp.com/terms-of-service INTEGRATION WITH HEALTH APP The app integrates with Apple’s Health app to track the following PHR (Personal Health Record) Data; duration, steps taken, calories and distance, and exercise type. Fitplan® and Health app connection can be turned on and off in “Sources” section of Health app and by default is off.

Follow our daily workouts with step-by-step HD video instruction. See how your entire body transforms with your hard work and sweat! Keep tabs on your weights, reps and time, and watch your results take shape. Get involved with our community, make friends, and get motivated! Try Fitplan® app free for 7 days. Every subscription includes full access to our growing library of 100+ Fitplan® programs. Access all Fitplan® programs with a subscription membership. Try our collection of single-day workouts for free. Fitplan® app Links: Instagram: @fitplan_app Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/groups/fitplancommunity/ Support: support@fitplanapp.com Note: Cancel any time by visiting settings in the app. If you cancel 24 hours before the 7-day trial is over then you will not be charged. If you cancel during the month period for which you've already paid (up to 24 hours before the next period starts), your subscription will continue until the end of that period. Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. apps.title: Fitness Buddy+ Workout Trainer
apps.description: Build muscle, gain strength, and lose weight with personalized workout routines tailored to your goals, fitness level, and available equipment. Every workout is designed to match your individual needs, allowing you to make lasting progress on your terms. Transform your health and lifestyle with a comprehensive approach to fitness that includes not just exercise, but also diet and habit formation. It's your ultimate companion for a healthier, stronger you. Unlock Your Full Fitness Potential with Fitness Buddy – Your Ultimate Workout Partner Celebrated by Users & Fitness Experts Alike ◆ Comprehensive Workout & Nutrition Planner: Tailored fitness plans for home and gym workouts. ◆ Extensive Exercise Database: Over 2400 exercises with detailed video guides and animations. ◆ Customizable Fitness Programs: Personalize your workout frequency and program duration to fit your lifestyle. ◆ Goal-Oriented Training Plans: Specific plans for weight loss, muscle gain, and improving overall fitness. ◆ Advanced Tracking Features: Monitor your progress with intuitive workout, nutrition, and body metric tracking. ◆ User-Centric Design: Easily select workouts based on available equipment and your training preferences. ◆ Diverse Fitness Content: From strength training to yoga, cater to all your fitness needs in one app. Empower Your Workout Experience ◆ Personalized Workout Guides: Enjoy workouts customized to your fitness level and goals. ◆ Dynamic Workout Routines: Varied programs to keep you engaged and ensure continuous progress. ◆ Build Your Own Routines: Save, modify, and create workouts that suit your preference. 1000+ Exercise Tutorials ◆ High-Quality Instructional Content: Multi-angle videos and comprehensive exercise descriptions. ◆ Versatile Exercise Search: Find exercises by muscle group, equipment, or keyword. ◆ All-Inclusive Fitness: Including cardio, mobility exercises, and options for every fitness level. ◆ Regular Content Updates: Always expanding the exercise library for an optimized workout experience. Optimize Your Nutrition ◆ Customized Meal Plans: Tailor your diet with options like keto, paleo, fasting, and vegetarian to suit your lifestyle. ◆ Delicious, Healthy Recipes: Explore hundreds of tasty, nutritious recipes that align with your meal plan. ◆ Nutritional Insights: Gain detailed calorie and nutrition information for each recipe, empowering your dietary choices. Seamless Integrations ◆ Health App Connectivity: Sync with Apple Health for a unified fitness tracking experience. ◆ Wearable Integration: Compatible with popular fitness trackers and available on iOS devices. Subscription Details Unlock full access with an easy subscription, available monthly or yearly, directly through your iTunes account. ◆ Flexible Subscription Options: Choose what works best for you. ◆ Hassle-Free Management: Easily manage your subscription through your account settings. ◆ Continuous Updates & Support: Get all the latest features and premium content to keep your fitness journey on track. Embark on a transformative fitness journey with Fitness Buddy, where your dedication meets our comprehensive support for unparalleled fitness achievements. Subscriptions auto-renew monthly or yearly, with charges to your iTunes upon purchase confirmation. Turn off auto-renewal in Account Settings at least 24 hours before the period ends to prevent renewal charges. Unused trial portions are forfeited upon cancellation. For full terms and privacy details, visit: https://www.azumio.com/page/privacypolicy

It's your all-in-one solution to easily monitor your workouts, track progress, and achieve your fitness goals with engaging insights and motivation. apps.title: Abs Workout Fitness Planet
apps.description: Abs workout is the mobile fitness app that helps you training your abdominal muscles at home or at the gym, a real muscle booster for your Six Pack! Your complete Fitness Planet to workout at home with thousands of ab exercises. This fitness App is ideal for bodybuilding lovers as well as for beginners, in fact in our fp App for your daily fitness you will find many routines for each goal: woman workout, workout for man, workouts for slimming, weight loss and much more. A real fitness planet that will help you achieve your goals, the personal trainer you were waiting for as a muscle booster. Like a real pf coach, this planet fitness app will offer you specific training plans to lose weight, remove the handles of love and obtain your perfect six pack. You will have a real workout planner and many routines to train the abdominal muscles and they can be performed when you want in your 24 hours daily, and you can train at home. Improve your body in just 30 days, track your workouts, learn new abdominal exercises, burn the fat on your abdomen with the famous P4P workouts. Your fp coach will give you precise instructions during your workouts like a real personal trainer in the gym but with the advantage of being able to workout at home as you want and when you want, you choose when to perform your home workout! All you have to do is put in your will power and we will deal with the rest ;-) Our promise is a perfect six pack in just 30 days if you follow carefully the instructions of the personal trainer without missing a workout and obviously keeping your diet under control. Our App to train your abdominal muscles can be downloaded for free, some functions will be completely free while others will be accessible if you decide to take out a subscription, the choice is yours. Free functions: • Over 10 routines created by certified personal trainers. • Bodyweight training for your home workout. • Display of the breathing wax for each individual exercise. • Fitness coach who instructs you with a real voice during your workout. • Abdominal workout generator with just 3 clicks. You can choose which zone of your abdomen to train, the level of intensity and the duration of your workout. • Add to the calendar the workout for the abs you prefer and choose how many times a week you want to repeat it, create your ideal workout planner. Paid features (requires a subscription) • Workout plans created by different personal trainers for different goals. • Ability to create and save personalized workouts with the Ab exercises you prefer. • Fiton Fitness Calendar for tracking future workouts. • Unlocking of all Abs exercises to train all areas of your abdomen: lower Abs, other abdomen and oblique ab. • Muscle booster at home Advice: use our Fitness App in combination with myfintesspal App to improve your diet, because remember that to have a sculpted abdomen you will need to lose fat as well as tone your abdominal muscles ;-) A complete mobile fitness planet App to muscle boost! #ft #fitness #planet #muscle #booster #fiton Privacy Policy: https://www.iubenda.com/privacy-policy/85870842 Terms of Use: https://www.iubenda.com/terms-and-conditions/85870842

We offer an extensive range of gym workouts to suit all your fitness needs. From dance workouts & yoga sessions led by our expert trainers to exercise routines designed for home fitness our app ensures your health journey is effective and enjoyable. Dive into a variety of fitness and sports activities such as badminton, swimming, tennis, etc, curated just for you Workout From the Gym or Exercise at Home - We've Got You Covered Whether you prefer the convenience of home fitness or the dynamic environment of a fitness setup, cult.fit has you covered. Our app features training programs that cater to both home workout enthusiasts and those who thrive in a gym setting. With a workout app that brings fitness to your fingertips, you can achieve your goals with the guidance of top-notch gym trainers. Types of Workouts : Curated Just For You Boxing: Build strength and agility. Yoga: Enhance flexibility and find balance with hatha yoga & evolve yoga Dance Fitness Workout: Enjoy a fun dance fitness workout where you can burn calories to great music Strength & Conditioning: Gain muscle and improve endurance with our strength training workout Burn: A workout format that combines high-intensity lower-impact training with other key elements of fitness like strength & mobility HRX: Helps in building core + full-body strength, muscle gaining, and mobility Bootcamp & Transform: Targeted routines for weight loss. cultpass ELITE and cultpass PRO Discover the benefits of our premium memberships, cultpass ELITE and cultpass PRO. With cult PLAY, you can enjoy: Swimming Badminton Tennis Table Tennis Squash Benefit from expert coaching, guaranteed playing partners, and beginner-friendly environments. Our fitness app delivers a comprehensive home fitness experience, making it easier than ever to stay active and healthy. Meditation sessions, health podcasts and more. apps.title: ProFit: Workout Planner
apps.description: Start training today to see tangible results and get fit! Pro Fit is here to guide you and help you to building your core strength, melt your unwanted weight and improve your performances. We are the most reliable and user-friendly application. Not only it is going to replace your traditional coach but also will let you track your performances in a simple way in order to make precise analyses about your workout. And it’s like having the best personal trainer in the palm of your hand, available 24/7/365. Get your whole body toned and feel like the best version of yourself. Everyday you will get what you’ve never seen before on the market: new, powerful, progressive and personalized workout for your level and goals that will look like some Stories form in most social apps. Surpass your expectations, achieve your daily goal, and share it with your friends on different social platforms. See your weight drop and your muscle grow in no time. Key Features: - 350+ Effective exercises for each muscle groups; - Detailed description of each exercise; - High quality photo and video guidance; - Images of involved muscles; - Pre-set workouts specific to your goals; - Ability to add your own workout with your custom exercises; - Built-in Journal for your workouts, for sets, reps and weights; - Built-in timer and calendar; - History of all your data with interactive graphs of your performance; - Fastest support; - Frequent updates; - Meal plans and recipes - Training plans created by top personal trainers - No muscle group is left behind in your personalized training plan. ProFit uses HealthKit to populate user profile data. The application requests access to the following data types: Units, Gender, Age, Weight and Height. When you take the survey in the app, you can quickly fill out data using synchronization with Apple Health. The synchronization with Apple Health can be switched off in the application Settings. You can try the ProFit app out for free by signing up to a free trial period. During the free 7-day trial, you’ll get the star treatment and will be able to try all fitness. As a ProFit app user, you can choose the subscription plan that best suits your needs, by considering the workout, and the costs. Our Premium 1-year subscription plan offers unlimited access to every level of every imaginable workout routine in exchange for a single payment. In addition, 1-week subscription and 1-month are available for users. For your convenience, ProFit subscriptions are set to automatically renew within the 24-hour period prior to the subscription end date. You can cancel your subscription at any moment in your iTunes account settings but refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the terms. Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. ProFit is integrated with the Health kit, so you can find your activities data in the Health App. We take the satisfaction and security of our customers very seriously. Read our terms of use at https://vgfit.com/terms and our privacy policy at https://vgfit.com/privacy For more questions or suggestions, please contact us.

apps.title: ClassPass: Fitness, Spa, Salon
apps.description: Download ClassPass today to book fitness classes & appointments at the top studios, gyms, salons and spas near you! How it works: • Download the free ClassPass app. • Sign up for a free trial and get credits to try activities like yoga, pilates, gym visits and more from some of our top-rated businesses — on us. • Browse studios, gyms, salons & spas near you (pro tip: filter by reservation type, location, time & more to easily find what you’re looking for!). • Book classes & appointments instantly without needing to create additional accounts or enter payment details. • After your trial, customize a plan that works best with your fitness & wellness routine. • Roll over unused credits up to the number of credits in your next month’s plan. • You’re never locked in – change or cancel your plan at any time. How to make the most of your membership: • Access thousands of the world’s leading fitness studios, gyms, salons and spas including CorePower Yoga, [solidcore], PureBarre, Glosslab & more! • Browse a list of recommended studios, gyms, salons & spas curated just for you. • Bookmark your favorites. • Invite friends to class and earn rewards. • Connect with friends who are already ClassPassers. • Receive badges to celebrate your milestones and share them with friends. • Read reviews & ratings from other ClassPassers to know what to expect with each reservation. ClassPass is available in more than 30 countries including: USA, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, United Kingdom, Ireland, France, Germany, Netherlands, Spain, Portugal, Switzerland, Austria, Sweden, Denmark, Finland, Norway, Singapore, Hong Kong, Malaysia, Thailand, Indonesia, Philippines, China, India, the United Arab Emirates, Brazil, Argentina & Chile

How it works: • Download the free ClassPass app. • Sign up for a free trial and get credits to try activities like yoga, pilates, gym visits and more from some of our top-rated businesses — on us. • Browse studios, gyms, salons & spas near you (pro tip: filter by reservation type, location, time & more to easily find what you’re looking for!). • Book classes & appointments instantly without needing to create additional accounts or enter payment details. • After your trial, customize a plan that works best with your fitness & wellness routine. • Roll over unused credits up to the number of credits in your next month’s plan. • You’re never locked in – change or cancel your plan at any time. How to make the most of your membership: • Access thousands of the world’s leading fitness studios, gyms, salons and spas including CorePower Yoga, [solidcore], PureBarre, Glosslab & more! • Browse a list of recommended studios, gyms, salons & spas curated just for you. • Bookmark your favorites. • Invite friends to class and earn rewards. • Connect with friends who are already ClassPassers. • Receive badges to celebrate your milestones and share them with friends. • Read reviews & ratings from other ClassPassers to know what to expect with each reservation. ClassPass is available in more than 30 countries including: USA, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, United Kingdom, Ireland, France, Germany, Netherlands, Spain, Portugal, Switzerland, Austria, Sweden, Denmark, Finland, Norway, Singapore, Hong Kong, Malaysia, Thailand, Indonesia, Philippines, China, India, the United Arab Emirates, Brazil, Argentina & Chile

apps.title: Wellhub (Gympass)
apps.description: Wellhub is an employee benefit provided by companies. Choose from a variety of options for fitness, mindfulness, nutrition, and sleep — all designed to cost less than paying for each individually. Free trial is available. Use your Wellhub plan to: - Visit your favorite gyms and studios — or try something new every day. Explore hundreds of activities like swimming, yoga, CrossFit, dance, and more. - Instantly access premium apps for meditation, sleep, and nutrition to support your mind and body. - Join virtual classes, work with expert personal trainers, and stay well wherever you are. - Participate in fun wellness challenges with coworkers and friends. - Your company might offer the option to add family members to your plan. Wellhub is how your company invests in your wellbeing–every day. Want Wellhub at your company or organization? → https://wellhub.com/en-us/refer-your-company/ Visit our website: https://wellhub.com Connect with us on: → Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wellhub/ → LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/wellhub/ → YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@wellhub

apps.title: Macrofit Fitness
apps.description: Welcome to the Macrofit App. Home to the most diverse portfolio of athletes for fitness and sport specific training. We work with professional athletes and trainers in the following sports: Surfing, Skiing, Basketball, Boxing, Golf, Calisthenics, Tennis, Rock Climbing, Yoga, Pilates, Running, Volleyball, and more. We also have programs for resistance training, weight-loss, and meditation. Our roster of athlete instructors include: John Collinson - Pro Big Mountain Skier Nick Symmonds - 2x Olympic Runner Koa Smith - Pro Surfer Alex Puccio - Pro Rock Climber, 11x National Bouldering Champion Tony Jeffries - Olympic Medalist Boxer Tori Boggs - 30x Grand World Jump Rope Champion Dr. Jen Esquer - Doctor of Physical Therapy Daniel Rama - International Yoga Instructor and Teacher Streat Hoerner - 2x CrossFit Games Athlete Our members get access to all of our programs as well as our professionally curated nutrition options with options such paleo, keto, intermittent fasting, vegan and more. Track your macros, log your workouts, and use many other features to help you reach your goals. Our most popular programs include: *Project Calisthenics Learn from one of the world’s top calisthenics athletes and physiotherapists, Simon Ata. Train for skills like the handstand pushup, planche, backlever, OAPU, and more. *Surfer Fit Train like a professional surfer. This program is all bodyweight and designed to build you the strength, mobility, and cardio needed to boost your surfing game. *Skier Fit John Collinson is a professional big mountain skier and known for his dedicated approach to fitness. Use just your bodyweight to get yourself in shape for the ski season. *Jiu Jitsu Fit Pro BJJ athlete JT Torres uses fun, dynamic exercises to not only build cardio and strength but to also get your body more familiar with BJJ movements. *Mobility for Calisthenics Doc Jen is not only a renowned doctor of physical therapy, but also an ex-calisthenics athlete. She prepared the perfect mobility program for all calisthenics athletes to further their skills. *Fit Yogasthenics Yogasthenics is a fusion of yoga, calisthenics, and holistic functional movement. This program is similar to a yoga class but with a twist that’s meant to challenge your inner athlete. ++many more The Macrofit App features: 1) Workout programs by sport and fitness pros: -Track your progress day to day -View full tutorials on every exercise of every program -Track your progress by logging workouts, images, and more -Compare and compete on the leaderboard 2) Thousands of recipes and meal plans: -Choose from our database of over 3.2M recipes sorted to your dietary needs -Variety of meal plans and challenges to get you to your goal -Calculate, set and track your macros 3) Challenges -Challenge a friend to a variety of fitness challenges -Challenge and compete against your favorite athlete 4) Innovative Hardware -Our top-tier team of engineers is always working on the next innovative design for home or sport specific training. -Check out the Fit! Home Gym. It’s the most versatile and compact bodyweight gym. Integrate with HealthKit to keep track of your steps, mileage, and flights of stairs to measure your progress each week. Customize your workouts with the Macrofit AI coach - tens of thousands of exercise videos available. ——— Learn more at http://www.macrofit.co Terms of Use: https://www.joinfitapp.com/terms.html Privacy Policy https://www.joinfitapp.com/privacy.html

apps.title: 7 Minute Workout:Home Exercise
apps.description: Most people don't get enough exercise and our app is a simple and fun way to get started. Scientific studies show that even short 7 minute workouts will help improve your health dramatically. The best part? Once you start, you won't be able to stop! Why The 7 Minute Workout App by 7M? • Professionally designed workouts that are short and effective. • Workouts that you can do anytime, anywhere. No equipment needed. • Personal trainer with voice and video instructions. We guide you all the way. • Beginner friendly workouts that are easy to perform but will still make you sweat. • Super simple to use custom workout builder so you can build your own workouts. • Apple Health integration to track your activity, weight, workouts and calories burned. Take control of your health and fitness and sweat with us every day! 7M - Let's get healthier together! SUBSCRIPTION INFORMATION Get a 7M Supporter subscription and enjoy full access to all features and content. The subscription will automatically renew unless turned off in your iTunes Account Settings at least 24 hours before current period ends. You can go to your iTunes Account settings to manage your subscription and turn off auto-renew. Your iTunes Account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed. If you subscribe before your free trial ends, the rest of your free trial period will be forfeited as soon as your purchase is confirmed. Note: This app is developed for informational purposes only. You should always consult your physician or doctor before starting any new fitness program. This app integrates with the Apple Health app. Terms of Use: https://7mfitness.com/terms-of-use Privacy Policy: https://7mfitness.com/privacy-policy

apps.title: Map My Fitness Workout Tracker
apps.description: Map My Fitness – All-in-one Workout Tracker & Fitness Planner Stay on top of your health goals with Map My Fitness, the all-in-one Workout Tracker and Fitness Tracker designed to help you build better habits, stay consistent, and train smarter. Whether you're getting started with daily exercise or optimizing your performance at the gym, this powerful fitness app keeps you accountable and inspired. Join a community of over 100 million users committed to movement, wellness, and self-improvement. Map My Fitness makes it easy to log every workout—at home, in the gym, or on the go—and see real results on your iPhone or Apple Watch. TRACK FITNESS EVERY ACTIVITY, EVERY DAY - Log over 600+ activities including walking, running, cycling, gym workouts, strength training, and more - Use the built-in Workout Tracker to track distance, time, pace, calories, and heart rate - Perfect for daily yoga, HIIT, and cardio workout routines - Monitor your progress with accurate GPS tracking and detailed performance stats - Easily record both indoor and outdoor sessions including yoga workout, gym training, and cross training No matter your style—calm yoga workouts, intense lifts, or steady cardio—this Fitness Tracker keeps everything in one place. PLAN & PERSONALIZE YOUR FITNESS ROUTINE - Create your own workout planner to match your goals and schedule - Browse the exercise video library of 100's of routines - Set weight loss, performance, or endurance goals and track your journey - Use built-in tools to adjust intensity and track consistency - Perfect for beginners building a routine or athletes fine-tuning a plan - Stay motivated with streaks, reminders, and progress summaries Your training, your pace. This Workout Tracker grows with you. CONNECT TO YOUR DEVICES & APPS - Sync with Apple Watch, Garmin, Polar, Suunto, and other top fitness wearables - Form Coaching tips for Garmin users to improve your form and prevent injury. - Pair with Apple Health to track your heart rate, close your activity rings, and sync health data - Pair with MyFitnessPal to balance your nutrition/meal planning and calorie burn - Connect Bluetooth wearables for advanced performance tracking - Integrate your Fitness Tracker with other top fitness apps for a complete picture of your wellness Whether you're indoors doing a gym workout or outside jogging, your progress is always up to date. TRAIN SMARTER WITH MVP PREMIUM Level up with Premium features made for serious progress: - Personal training plans that adapt to your fitness level - Live Tracking to share your workout with loved ones for safety - Heart rate zone analysis to optimize every cardio workout - Limited Ads – focus on your workout and minimize distractions in the app. - Custom workout splits, pace alerts, and deeper insights - Perfect for anyone serious about gym training, daily exercise, and long-term results. MOTIVATION THROUGH COMMUNITY - Connect with friends or meet new workout partners - Share your achievements and get inspired by others - Join fitness challenges to stay engaged and win rewards - Support and be supported by millions of users just like you - From solo stretches to group gym workouts, motivation is only a tap away. YOUR FITNESS JOURNEY STARTS NOW Download Map My Fitness today and make every move count. From tracking cardio workouts to building your ideal workout planner, this powerful Workout Tracker and Fitness Tracker is your everyday companion for a healthier, stronger you. EULA: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

apps.title: Gymshark: Shop Gym Clothes
apps.description: Gymshark App – Your Ultimate Activewear Shopping Experience Upgrade your fitness wardrobe with the Gymshark App, your go-to destination for gym clothes, sporting goods & workout apparel. Whether you're training in the gym, running outdoors or embracing an active lifestyle, our app provides exclusive access to the latest gym clothing collections, fitness apparel & workout clothes with seamless shopping & personalized recommendations—all in one place. WHY DOWNLOAD THE GYMSHARK APP? ▶ EARLY ACCESS TO EXCLUSIVE GYM CLOTHES Stay ahead of the game & shop the newest Gymshark gym clothes & sporting goods before anyone else. With early access to fresh drops, restocks, & limited-edition releases, you'll never miss out on must-have workout gear & fitness apparel. With app-only collections, access exclusive workout clothes & high performance designs that won't be found anywhere else. ▶ PERSONALIZED SHOPPING EXPERIENCE Find your perfect fit with Your Edit, a customized selection of gym clothes & sporting goods tailored to your style & preferences. Whether you're searching for leggings, sports bras, workout shorts, gym hoodies, or compression wear, the app curates recommendations based on your browsing history. Shop smarter, not harder. ▶ SEAMLESS & SECURE CHECKOUT Fast, easy, & hassle-free. With the Gymshark App, shopping for your favorite gym clothes & fitness apparel has never been simpler. Choose from multiple secure payment options, including Apple Pay, & enjoy a fast, smooth checkout experience. ▶ INSTANT UPDATES & NOTIFICATIONS Turn on push notifications to be the first to know about new product launches, exclusive sporting goods, workout clothes, & fitness apparel drops, flash sales, & early-access promotions. Get notified the moment your favorite gym outfits & training gear restock, so you never miss out. ▶ ORDER TRACKING & MANAGEMENT Track your orders & stay updated on your shipment status. Whether you're waiting on a fresh pair of squat-proof leggings, high-performance gym shorts, or seamless workout tops, you’ll always know exactly when your new gym clothes will arrive. ▶ BUILD & MANAGE YOUR WISHLIST Save your must-have gym clothes, workout gear, & sporting goods in one convenient place. Build your ideal workout wardrobe by adding sportswear essentials to your wishlist, so you can easily shop later. ▶ EXCLUSIVE CONTENT & VIP OFFERS Unlock Gymshark-exclusive content, fitness tips, & special discounts through the app. You'll always have access to the latest workout clothes, sporting goods, & fitness fashion and trends. ▶ JOIN THE GYMSHARK COMMUNITY More than just a clothing store, Gymshark is a movement. Be part of a global workout & fitness community that inspires, motivates, & supports your active lifestyle. Connect with fellow athletes, fitness enthusiasts, & professionals who share your passion for training, strength, & performance. WHY SHOP WITH GYMSHARK? We’re here to redefine gym clothes & workout apparel with high-performance designs that blend style, comfort, & function. Designed for every athlete, every workout, & every movement, our collections include: Gym leggings & seamless leggings – Squat-proof, supportive, & ultra-flattering. Sports bras & tops – Designed for support & breathable comfort. Gym shorts & joggers – Flexibility, mobility, & comfort in every movement. Hoodies & jackets – Stay warm, stay stylish, stay ready. Compression wear & performance gear – Next-level endurance & support. From HIIT workouts to strength training, running, yoga, & recovery days, we have the gym clothes you need to perform at your best. DOWNLOAD THE GYMSHARK APP TODAY Shop the best in gym clothes, fitness fashion, sporting goods, & workout gear at your fingertips. Download now & experience the ultimate Gymshark clothing store shopping experience—anytime, anywhere.

apps.description: Sworkit delivers personalized workouts, meditation, and nutrition guidance for all fitness levels. Our app has helped millions of users achieve their health goals, from beginners to athletes. Why Choose Sworkit? • Customizable workouts for various goals: weight loss, muscle gain, flexibility, and more • Expert-designed programs for injury recovery and pain reduction • Mindfulness and stress reduction exercises • Flexible routines adaptable to your schedule and available equipment • Special content for new parents, travelers, and professionals • Unique library of kids' workouts for teachers, parents, and coaches Features: • 6-week guided workout plans for all levels • 900+ bodyweight and small equipment exercises • 500+ workouts including HIIT, Tabata, cardio, strength, yoga, Tai Chi, and Pilates • Create custom routines tailored to your needs • 1-on-1 assistance from certified personal trainers • Available in 15 languages • Motivational fitness plans and movement challenges Integrations: • Google Fit: Track workouts and calories burned • MyFitnessPal and Strava: Sync your workouts for enhanced connectivity Subscription Information: Sworkit offers a free 7-day trial. apps.title: EvolveYou: Strength For Women
apps.description: The strength training & wellbeing app for women with structured programs to achieve results that will last - TRY OUR 7 DAY FREE TRIAL. Designed for women who want structure to their training, nutrition support to achieve results that will last - we’ll take the guesswork out of your training and help you build confidence both in and outside the gym. We believe that every woman should feel confident lifting weights. This is why in the EvolveYou you will find: - 1000s of nutritious recipes for every preference - Macronutrient tracking and guided meal planning - Shopping list generator and Apple Health sync - Access expert tips, tutorials, and mindset tools - Learn about cycle syncing, recovery, and wellness - We help you understand your body and unlock your full potential—inside and out. Join a powerful community of supportive women; - Workout with our qualified trainers; Krissy Cela, Maddie De-Jesus Walker, Mia Green, Charlotte Lamb, Saman Munir, Krsna Garr, and Emily Mouu - Connect with others in our in-app forum to share your wins, ask questions, and stay motivated - Be part of challenges that unite and inspire Whether you're finding your fitness rhythm or chasing new personal bests, EvolveYou meets you where you are—and helps you become who you want to be. Replace long cardio workouts with shorter and more effective HIIT workouts. No equipment needed. Workout anytime,anywhere. No excuses. Features: • Scientifically proven short high intensity workouts to improve your health. • Custom templates so you can build your own timers. • Step by step instructions suitable for beginners and intermediates alike. • Calendar and weight tracker to track your progress. • Voice and video instructions. It's like having a personal trainer in your pocket. • This app is integrated with Apple Health to track your workouts,calories and weight. Free,quick and effective. What are you waiting for? Download the app,and get sweating! 7M - We heart fitness! apps.title: Move With Us
apps.description: Welcome to Move With Us, the movement for every body. Move With Us is a female health and fitness app that provides you with the most effective home and gym workouts and customised meal guides to help you achieve your fitness goals. Whether you’re looking to get started with your fitness journey, take your training to the next level, build strength, sculpt and shape, improve your pilates practice or running - we've got something for you. The Move With Us App is designed to help every woman reach her potential. Workouts: - Train anywhere, anytime with access to home and gym workout options for all fitness levels. - On-Demand, guided video workouts including Pilates, Yoga, Form and Technique, Running, Mobility and so much. - Choose a 4, 5 or 6-day Training Split. - Customisable Workout Planner where you can adjust your training protocol to suit your needs. - Access our exclusive Workout Library with hundreds of additional Warm Ups, Target Workouts, Sculpting Circuits, No Equipment Workouts, 30-minute HIIT Workouts, Cardio Options, Finishers, Burnout Challenges and Cool Downs. - Regression, progression, no equipment, exercise swap and pregnancy-friendly swap options for all exercises. - Video demonstrations, exercise descriptions, explainer videos to help with form, a playable workout feature and timer, exercise swap options and so much more. Plus, you can track your weights, reps, sets, and performance! Nutrition: - Receive a Meal Guide with calories and macros to your individual measurements and goals. - Access customised Meal Guide options, created for your goals and preferences. - Access over 1,500 Recipes and browse our entire library of recipes by calories, macros, dietary restrictions, and even meal categories! - Serving Size Tool - cooking for more than one? Increase your servings with ease through our Serving Size feature available in every recipe. - Embracing diverse dietary needs, we cater to a broad range of preferences, including dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, red meat-free, seafood-free, vegetarian, and vegan options. - Gain access to our library of over 1500+ recipes that seamlessly integrate into your Meal Guide with a simple tap. - Our dashboard updates your daily calorie and macronutrient targets throughout the day for easy tracking. - Effortlessly manage your nutrition journey with our interactive Shopping List, which not only captures recommended Meal Guide essentials but also accommodates your personalised additions. Progress Tracking, Goal Setting, Support and Accountability: - Check-ins with our dietitians to update your calories based on your progress. - Tools to track your daily hydration, steps, sleep and nutrition compliance. - Log weekly measurements and progress photos. - Goal setting feature, an interactive to-do list and daily reflection. - Integration with the Health App to sync your daily steps. All new customers can enjoy a FREE 7 Day Trial! Our mission is to educate women on fitness and nutrition to build strong minds, bodies and habits. We’d love to welcome you to our Community and help you achieve your fitness goals. Move With Us App is free to download and offers a Platinum Membership where you can move with us all year round! The Move With Us iOS App is available under the standard Apple Terms of Use (EULA): https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

apps.title: obé | Fitness for women
apps.description: Work out smarter, not harder. obé cuts the guesswork and helps you look forward to moving your body—for good. Take a quiz to share your fitness goals, we’ll create a personalized, progressive at-home workout plan for you to follow (in minutes!). Like to do your own thing? Try out 20+ class types across 10,000+ on-demand classes with options from HIIT, Dance Cardio, and Boxing to Strength, Pilates, Sculpt, and more. Go for a progressive training program when you’re ready for something new (like learning Yoga or running a 5K), or reset your fitness routine with a 7-14 day challenge. Designed for women and their unique needs, obé is built to boost your body literacy and help you fall in love with movement. Explore features like cycle syncing workouts, class suggestions based on mood, Express options for busy days, and more. Try the obé workout app free for 7 days! —------------ WORKOUT PLANS AS UNIQUE AS YOU: obé builds you a personalized, data-informed fitness plan based on your history, preferences, and the way you form habits. You’ll always have 2 weeks' worth of classes on your schedule with the flexibility to skip or move them around. 20+ CLASS TYPES: Bye, boring exercise. Build your foundation with strength, sweat it out with cardio, and unwind with recovery. Filter classes by duration, equipment type, body focus, impact, level, or music type to find your perfect match. Sculpt | Strength | Dance Exercise | Pilates | Yoga | HIIT | Barre | Stretch | Cardio Boxing | Bounce | Ride | Step | Meditation | Run | Breathwork | Endurance | Foam Roll | Walk | Yoga Sculpt | Prenatal Workout | Kids Workout ONE-STOP FITNESS FOR WOMEN: Discover what works best for your body with cycle syncing, cycle tracking + insights, pelvic floor exercises, wellness practices, strength training for women, prenatal + postnatal workouts, and more. SUPERCHARGE YOUR HEALTH: Our class plans and programs can change your body composition, boost cardiovascular health, balance hormone health, and slow aging while boosting longevity. Tap into activity metrics, heart health stats, and more with Health Connect plus your wearable device. MASTER NEW SKILLS: Whether you’re ready to take up running, build a Yoga practice, try Pilates, or lose weight sustainably (spoiler: strength training is key!), our workout Programs and Challenges mix work with play to set you up for success. PERSONAL TRAINING: Need more accountability? Add personal training to your membership for one-on-one support. We’ll match you with an exercise coach who’ll fine-tune your plan, check in regularly, and keep you motivated for the long haul. IMPROVE YOUR MOOD: Need a mood boost? Log your daily mood, and we’ll recommend classes depending on how you’re feeling (or want to feel) that day. TAKE CLASSES ANYWHERE: Do your daily workout at home, in the gym, on the trail, or at a rest stop. With obé, you can download classes to your offline library, tune in anywhere there’s service, or go for audio-guided options when you want to be hands-free. JOIN THE MOVEMENT: More than 60% of U.S. women don’t get enough exercise. Some of the reasons? Not knowing where to start, thinking fitness is all-or-nothing (thanks, diet culture), juggling endless responsibilities, and being told we all build habits the same way. obé is here to change that. A subscription is required to use the obé app. Sign up for an auto-renewable monthly or annual subscription to access all live and on-demand video content. Payment for this plan will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. The account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours before the end of the current period, at the cost of the monthly or annual plan that you subscribed to. Auto-renewal may be turned off in your Account Setting in iTunes after purchase. Terms of Service: https://www.obefitness.com/terms-of-service/

apps.title: Life Time Digital
apps.description: UNLIMITED ACCESS TO FITNESS, HEALTH & WELLNESS — ANYTIME, ANYWHERE — NO CLUB MEMBERSHIP REQUIRED Download the Life Time Digital app and unlock the ultimate destination for your healthiest, happiest life. At home, at the gym, or on the go, enjoy world-class fitness classes, expert nutrition plans, guided meditations, podcasts, and lifestyle programs — all in one seamless experience. L•AI•C – THE FUTURE OF HEALTHY LIVING Meet L•AI•C (“lay-see”), your personal wellness companion — powered by AI, backed by Life Time expertise, and designed to help you live smarter and healthier. More than an assistant, L•AI•C is your coach, guide, concierge, and motivator — tailored to you. • Personalized Plans, Real Results. Dynamic workouts built for your goals, schedule, and lifestyle. Whether training for a race, building strength, or improving sleep, she keeps you moving forward. • Expert Answers, Instantly. Tap into Life Time’s expertise. Ask anything — “How do I recover faster?” “What’s a high-protein breakfast?” — and get actionable advice in seconds. • A Concierge That Gets You. Find classes, reserve courts, schedule appointments, and discover experiences — personalized to your habits, schedule, and club events. FOR EVERYONE PREMIUM FITNESS & WELLNESS, ANYWHERE • Stream unlimited on-demand and live fitness classes led by top instructors — including strength, cardio, yoga, barre, HIIT, cycling, and more. • Explore workout programs tailored to goals like weight loss, strength training, active aging, and healthy habit formation. • Enjoy workouts and fitness plans that adapt to your level and schedule. PERSONALIZED NUTRITION & HEALTH COACHING • Follow nutrition plans and healthy meal guides crafted by certified experts. • Get hyper-personalized workouts curated by L•AI•C—Life Time’s intelligent wellness companion—based on your goals, preferences, and lifestyle. • Build sustainable routines that support your body, mind, and lifestyle. MIND & BODY WELLNESS TOOLS • Access guided meditations, breathwork, recovery sessions, and sleep support. • Listen to full episodes of the Life Time Talks podcast for inspiration on health, wellness, mindset, and motivation. • Read exclusive articles from Experience Life Magazine on longevity, stress, mental health, and holistic living. ATHLETIC EVENTS & RACE TOOLS • Find and Register for Events – Discover Life Time’s premier athletic events nationwide—marathons, cycling races, triathlons, and more—all in one place. • Race Training & Recovery Plans – Get expert-designed training programs to boost endurance, improve performance, and speed up recovery for your next race. • Digital Race Pass & Easy Check-In – Skip the lines with your digital race pass and check in seamlessly at Life Time events. • Track & Share Race Results – Instantly find, claim, and share your official race results directly in the app. LIFESHOP – WELLNESS & FITNESS ESSENTIALS • Trusted Supplements – Fuel your goals with premium formulas like D.Tox, magnesium, electrolytes, protein, greens, and more. • Activewear & Recovery Gear – Find top-rated apparel and gear for training, performance, and recovery. • Earn Rewards – Get 5% back on every in-app purchase as a Life Time app user. FOR CLUB MEMBERS ENHANCED FEATURES FOR OUR CLUB MEMBERS • Check in to the club and sign up for events. • Reserve classes, camps, and more. • Order from the café, bistro, or book LifeSpa services. • Manage your membership anytime. Download now and start your journey to a stronger, healthier you. Some features may require a Life Time membership. Consult a physician before starting any fitness program. Privacy Policy: https://my.lifetime.life/policy/privacy-policy.html Terms of Use: http://www.apple.com/legal/itunes/appstore/dev/stdeula

ATHLETIC EVENTS & RACE TOOLS • Find and Register for Events – Discover Life Time’s premier athletic events nationwide—marathons, cycling races, triathlons, and more—all in one place. • Race Training & Recovery Plans – Get expert-designed training programs to boost endurance, improve performance, and speed up recovery for your next race. • Digital Race Pass & Easy Check-In – Skip the lines with your digital race pass and check in seamlessly at Life Time events. • Track & Share Race Results – Instantly find, claim, and share your official race results directly in the app. LIFESHOP – WELLNESS & FITNESS ESSENTIALS • Trusted Supplements – Fuel your goals with premium formulas like D.Tox, magnesium, electrolytes, protein, greens, and more. • Activewear & Recovery Gear – Find top-rated apparel and gear for training, performance, and recovery. • Earn Rewards – Get 5% back on every in-app purchase as a Life Time app user. FOR CLUB MEMBERS ENHANCED FEATURES FOR OUR CLUB MEMBERS • Check in to the club and sign up for events. • Reserve classes, camps, and more. • Order from the café, bistro, or book LifeSpa services. • Manage your membership anytime. Download now and start your journey to a stronger, healthier you. Some features may require a Life Time membership. Consult a physician before starting any fitness program. apps.title: Fitness Point Pro: Home & Gym
apps.description: Over 9.000.000 downloads! Now with Apple Watch support! Health App support! Create a personal workout or select one of the pre-defined workout plans to get you started right away! We got world-best bodyweight workout generator! Together with professional trainers we developed an artificial intelligence algorithm that can automatically create a bodyweight workout based on your fitness level. Fitness Point is a simple app, to follow your progress at the gym and much more. Just everything, that you need! Best usability and design on the App Store among competitors! Try out the free version and purchase the PRO version with additional features. PRO version additional Features: - Over 400 gym exercises with description, animations and trained muscle - Graph to visualize your log data for each exercise (including workload and RM calculator) - Body tracker to control your weight and more (with graph) - Timer to control precisely your breaks between exercises - Automatic timer start - Full screen timer - Log workout time - Calories count - Unlimited number of logs, workouts and custom exercises - Supersets - Export all your logged data as a .csv file. - No ads! For full experience get the Expert membership to unlock everything. Expert Membership additional Features: - Additional 200 bodyweight exercises - Free personal workout (for home or gym) - Cloud service to save your data securely - Never lose your data with automatic upload to cloud - Synchronize all your devices automatically - Access to Web-version! - Share workouts with friends - Trainers can access customer's data - Priority email support. Get an answer within 24 hours! Free and PRO version basic Features: --- General --- - One app for all your devices: iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch - Health & Fitness apps support --- Exercises --- - Many preinstalled exercises with description, animations and trained muscle. - Create new exercises with muscle group, description, primary/secondary muscle and your custom image. --- Workouts --- - Create a workout plan with exercises you like. - Enter your target sets and reps. for every exercise. - Quick navigation on entering logs with swipe gestures. - Shop with workout plans created by professional trainers. --- Logs --- - Add Logs to every exercise. - Calendar view of all logs. - Edit logs. --- Settings --- - Show weight in imperial or metric units. - Change language for the interface and exercise description. This version is designed especially for males. All exercises are with male models and workout plans are designed for male’s needs. If you are female, you should consider purchasing other Pro version. Visit https://fitnesspointapp.com/ to get more infos. apps.title: Sculpt You: Women's Fitness
apps.description: No one is you, and that is your power. Katrina Wright created The Sculpt You to be the most affordable and accessible health & wellness program on the market - one that encompasses all aspects of health, both mental & physical. This is a program that offers a safe and fun space to truly become your best self. One that encourages you to build a deeper relationship with yourself, and to discover what makes you feel confident within your own skin. A program that takes away the guesswork so that you can get the RESULTS you really want! Utilize our structured - Home & Gym workouts designed for maximum muscle growth, our customized Meal Plans created by our Registered Dietitians, a customized Mental Health System, Period Tracker, Dance/Yoga/Cardio & Core Activities, and even fun Monthly Challenges... everything you need to get in tune with your body and become the strongest version of yourself. We are constantly updating our app to further support your development & personal growth journey, and are excited to have you here to experience the magic with us. Daily Home Workouts & Gym Workouts Our workouts follow a structured 4-week, full-body progressive overload split, designed and created by Katrina Wright - for maximum growth. Each month, the workout split changes. All workouts include warm-ups and cool-downs designed by our Physical Therapist and Strength & Conditioning Coach. In-depth form videos & explanations are included with each exercise. For home workouts, all you need are dumbbells and a glute band! Pregnancy workouts Stay fit and strong throughout your pregnancy and beyond with our specialized workout plans tailored week by week for every trimester, plus postpartum recovery! Whether you prefer exercising at the gym or at home, our workouts, yoga and pilates classes are thoughtfully designed to support your changing body, keep you healthy, and help you prepare for childbirth—all while prioritizing the safety of you and your baby. Customized Meal Plans Our Registered Dietitian designed a comprehensive meal plan system to help you become the healthiest version of yourself as you reach your goals! You can decide if you want to track your calories and macros, or if you’d prefer to use our intuitive eating meal plans which give you the option to hide amounts & numbers. We have 4 different meal plans to choose from Finding Balance, Hormone Health, Vegan, and Gluten/Soy/Dairy Free. We focus on easy, quick, yummy, and affordable recipes! Customized Mental Health System Take our mental health quiz and receive a customized mental health plan for your busy schedule - including Yoga, Breath Work, Journal Prompts, and more. Period Tracker Understand how you can support each phase of your cycle (and see better results) through exercise, diet, and emotional support. Dance/Yoga/Cardio & Core Activities Shake it like a salt-shaker with our Dance classes, invite feelings of self-love through Yoga, and work with our Doctor of Physical Therapy in our Cardio & Core section. Monthly Challenges Free monthly challenges are included in your membership to help hold you accountable, make training even more fun, and give you an extra push! Every month, 4 members are chosen to win $500, plus every winner receives $100 to donate to the charity of their choice! Subscription Details Your subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period. Automatic renewals will cost the same price you were originally charged for the subscription. You can turn off auto-renewal at any time by going to your Account Settings on the App Store after purchase. Privacy Policy: https://thesculptyou.com/policies/privacy-policy Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula Contact: support@thesculptyou.com

apps.title: Oura
apps.description: Meet Oura Ring - the revolutionary smart ring that translates your body’s most meaningful messages to transform how you feel every day. The award-winning Oura App is your personal health companion, delivering valuable insights and daily recommendations to help you to make health and wellness a daily practice. THREE DAILY SCORES Your Sleep, Activity, and Readiness scores give you a clear understanding of the state of your body with actionable guidance on how to stay balanced. ACCURATE BY DESIGN Your finger provides the most accurate reading for over 30 biometrics like heart rate, body temperature, blood oxygen, and more. BEST-IN-CLASS SLEEP MONITORING Wake up to in-depth analysis of your sleep patterns and personalized tips to optimize your routine, so you’ll feel more energized every day. ADVANCED ACTIVITY TRACKING From mountain climbing to meditating, Oura Ring tracks your daily movement while prioritizing balance and rest. Measure your daily activities, calories, steps, and inactive time. CYCLE INSIGHTS Better understand your body’s cycle patterns or help improve your chances of getting pregnant by tracking daily and monthly body temperature trends. STRESS RESILIENCE Understand how daily stress is affecting your body and learn how to be more resilient to stress by finding balance between moments of strain and recovery. RECOVERY Get personalized insights and guidance on how rest and recovery affects your overall Readiness Score. Feeling under the weather? Activate Rest Mode to give yourself a break. ILLNESS DETECTION Oura Ring monitors shifts in your body temperature and heart rate so you can tell when you may be getting sick. LONG-TERM TRENDS View your daily, weekly, and monthly trends, and discover how your choices and environment affect your body. TRACK HABITS WITH TAGS Customize your experience and test out new habits by adding tags — like "caffeine" or "alcohol" — and discover how your choices affect your sleep and recovery. Oura Ring is not a medical device and is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, monitor, or prevent medical conditions or illnesses. Oura Ring is only designed for general fitness and wellness purposes. Please do not make any changes to your medication, daily routines, nutrition, sleep schedule, or workouts without first consulting your doctor or another medical professional.

apps.title: Home Fitness Workout by GetFit
apps.description: Lose weight, tone muscles, or get into their dream shape with Home Fitness Workout by GetFit! Commit to a healthy habit today and see positive changes in no time. You'll never have to pay for a gym membership again! Features: - 42 club. Find the motivation, guidance, and tools to achieve life-long results without challenging your busy schedule. Build a healthy mindset in just 42 minutes a day. - RocketBody AI. Game-changing Artificial intelligence is built to provide personalized workouts tailored to the current condition of your heart. - Time-efficient workouts with no equipment. With these bodyweight workouts, you'll get the most out of your time, no matter how short it is, without any special equipment. - Personalized and masterclass programs. Achieve your goals through short personalized daily bodyweight workouts designed by certified GetFit fitness trainers and tailored to you. - Guidelines and tutorials. Video tutorials explain how to perform each exercise correctly, and with voice comments, timers, and a stopwatch, you'll be sure that you are doing everything the right way. - Apple Watch support. Connect your Apple Watch and keep an eye on the progress with all the data recorded. - Support and inspiration. Expand your knowledge, sharpen your mind, and share your thoughts on fitness, nutrition, and mindset on our Blog. Start your fitness journey now, and take the first and most crucial step to reaching your goal by investing a few minutes today. Try it and see progress after the first day! HealthKit is used to synchronize with Apple Health and Activity, so you can export exercise data from our app to HealthKit and import fitness data, weight, and body measurements from HealthKit to our app. The app contains the following subscription options: - 3 months without a trial period - 12 months with a 7-day free trial period Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase - Free trial subscription is automatically renewed unless canceled 24 hours before the renewal - Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period - Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication - Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase - Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period Please note, you won’t be able to use app features without an active subscription. Privacy Policy: https://getfitapps.com/privacy.html Terms of Service: https://getfitapps.com/terms.html
